Freshsales is an API Key based integration and does not require the setup of an app. ​ Required Credentials of a Linked Account To successfully connect with the Freshsales integration, a Linked Account or an end-user will need to provide the following to connect: API Key Freshsales CRM Domain To understand how a Linked Account can get the above mentioned credentials, refer below. ​ Getting Credentials of Freshsales To acquire the required credentials and connect a Linked Account, please follow the steps mentioned below: Log in to your Freshsales account . Go to the Settings option in the side menu and click on Apps & Integrations option. Click on API Settings and copy the API Key displayed as Your API Key and the Freshsales CRM Domain displayed as Your bundle alias . The Linked Account or end-user now have all the credentials required to connect with Freshsales. ​ Actions and triggers In Cobalt, you can create orchestrations of your use-cases using Freshsales actions and triggers. Following are the set of Freshsales actions and triggers supported by Cobalt. Actions Triggers Account Create Account - Create an account in Freshsales. Update account - Update an account in Freshsales. Delete account - Delete an account in Freshsales. Contact Create Contact - Add a new contact in Freshsales. Update Contact - Update a contact in Freshsales. Delete Contact - Delete a contact in Freshsales. Deal Create Deal - Create a deal in Freshsales. Update Deal - Update a deal in Freshsales. Delete Deal - Delete a deal in Freshsales. Others HTTP Request - Make HTTP API calls to any Freshsales documented REST APIs.
